original_text: Hast thou commanded the morning since thy days; and caused the dayspring to know his place;
korean_text: 네가 너의 날에 아침에게 명령하였느냐 새벽에게 그 자리를 일러 주었느냐

sentences.original_text: Hast thou commanded the morning since thy days
and caused the dayspring to know his place
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 동녘에 그 자리를 알게 했느냐
